page.title: 18Schools in K.Lynn& S.Wootton
page.content: There are 3 schools in our area:-an all through{county primary}covering the age range{5-11,}a{junior school catering for the{8-11's}and a{special {school}covering the age{5-18. The junior school is in South Wootton and was completed in 1979.It was built for a maximum of 180 children.This school takes children from South Wootton First school, which is close by and is able to take some children from outside its catchment area, as there is surplus space.This school has active parental support for fund raising and also helping.They generally raise approx.Â£1,000 a year for the school.The children from the primary schools go on to all ability high schools in King's Lynn or alter- atively may opt to go to Wymondham College if they 'need' to board or if parents can afford Â£2,300for boarding.
